colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB MCHOD DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS SU MCHOD PA BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA GZHIR BYAS TE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA NGES PAR THOG PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
